headline: Citizens Financial Group And 2 Other Stocks That May Be Priced Below Their Estimated Worth
summary: As the U.S. stock market kicks off a holiday-shortened trading week with significant gains, investors are buoyed by optimism around a potential Federal Reserve interest rate cut in December. In this environment of heightened confidence, identifying stocks that may be undervalued compared to their estimated worth can be particularly appealing, as they offer opportunities for growth amidst broader market enthusiasm.
